sentences.en: A 10 to 15 percent deviation is considered acceptable.
About half the subjects considered themselves to be telepathic.
sentences.cn: 实验对象中有一半左右自认为有心灵感应能力。

sentences.en: Any entry arriving after the closing date will not be considered.
sentences.cn: 截止日期之后报名参赛的人将不予考虑。

sentences.en: Blue and green eyeshadow has long been considered kitsch.
sentences.cn: 蓝色和绿色的眼影一直被认为是俗气的。

sentences.en: Caviar and oysters on ice are generally considered the ultimate luxury foods.
sentences.cn: 一般认为，鱼子酱和冰镇牡蛎是顶级美味。

sentences.en: Chantal would have considered it ill-mannered to show surprise.
sentences.cn: 钱特尔会认为表现出吃惊是失态的。

sentences.en: Denver has the inside track among 10 sites being considered.
sentences.cn: 丹佛在10个被考虑的地点之中具有优势。

sentences.en: Even among seasoned mountaineers Pinnacle Ridge is considered quite a tough proposition.
sentences.cn: 即使在经验丰富的登山者中，平纳克尔峰也被认为是很难攀登的。

sentences.en: Generally, the lower classes are considered to be the bearers of tradition.
sentences.cn: 总的来说，下层民众被认为是传统的保持者。

sentences.en: He hadn’t had time to form a considered opinion .
sentences.cn: 他还没有来得及细想出一个成熟的意见。

sentences.en: Rain water was once considered to be good for the complexion.
sentences.cn: 雨水曾一度被认为可以滋养皮肤。

sentences.en: She was being paid what I considered a derisory amount of money.
sentences.cn: 在我看来，她得到的报酬真是少得可怜。

sentences.en: Such a motion is considered a test of backbench opinion.
sentences.cn: 这样的动议被视为对后座议员立场的考验。

sentences.en: The choreography of Eric Hawkins is considered radical by ballet audiences.
sentences.cn: 芭蕾舞观众认为埃里克·霍金斯的舞蹈设计非常前卫。

sentences.en: The committee is meeting to prepare a considered response to the problem.
sentences.cn: 委员会正在开会，给这个问题研究出一个成熟的答复。

sentences.en: The empirical evidence considered here is subject to many qualifications.
sentences.cn: 此处提及的实验证据有诸多限制条件。

sentences.en: The landlord refused to serve him because he considered him too drunk.
sentences.cn: 酒吧老板觉得他已经喝多了，拒绝再给他添酒。

words.tran_cn: 相当大的；重要的，值得考虑的

trans.tran_cn: 经过仔细考虑的，经过深思熟虑的，受尊敬的，经过深思熟虑的看法
trans.tran_en: a considered opinion, reply, judgment etc is one that you have thought about carefully

trans.tran_cn: 考虑( consider的过去式和过去分词)，想，注意，看重
